DeviceUseStatement.description: A record of a device being used by a patient where the record is the result of a report from the patient or another clinician.

identifier.description: An external identifier for this statement such as an IRI.

basedOn.description: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this DeviceUseStatement.

status.description: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about.  Generally this will be active or completed.

subject.description: The patient who used the device.

derivedFrom.description: Allows linking the DeviceUseStatement to the underlying Request, or to other information that supports or is used to derive the DeviceUseStatement.

timingTiming.description: How often the device was used.

timingPeriod.description: How often the device was used.

timingDateTime.description: How often the device was used.

recordedOn.description: The time at which the statement was made/recorded.

source.description: Who reported the device was being used by the patient.

device.description: The details of the device used.

reasonCode.description: Reason or justification for the use of the device.

reasonReference.description: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this DeviceUseStatement.

bodySite.description: Indicates the anotomic location on the subject's body where the device was used ( i.e. the target).

note.description: Details about the device statement that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.
